title: QuickLink
info: A very easy to use, dummy proof link shortner built using flask. It shows the public history of the short links generated

title: BBS BLog
info: Simple Blog website which is made using Django and uses SQLite to store the Blogs. I made this following a tutorial

title: GestureVolume control
info: Simple Blog website which is made using Django and uses SQLite to store the Blogs. I made this following a tutorial

title: Dynamic cards
info: Divisions expands and unfold into card like structure, Each card has some details associated to it.

title: PassKey Genrator
info: Generates Random passwords based on your input. made using vanilla JS. You can manage your passwords for different websites

title: NoteZ
info: A Simple Notes Apllication for GenZ users. You can create Notes upto 250 chracters and it is saved into local storage in JSON

title: Open News
info: Very Simple news application to fetch news from news API. Built with React and Material UI as component library
